Clover Infotech - Cyber Security Analyst - Vulnerability Management

Company: Clover Infotech
Location: Gurugram, Haryana, India
LinkedIn post
Title : Cyber Security Expert - Clover Infotech

Work Location : Gurgaon / Gurugram (Work from Office)

Education Qualification : Any Graduate

Experience : 5 - 8 Years.

Skill Required

  • Expertise in designing, implementing, and managing Security Components viz End point Detection and Response, Data Loss Prevention, Proxy, Web Application Firewall, Encryption, SIEM, Firewall, Mobile Device Management, Threat Management etc
  • Strong understanding of network protocols, TCP/IP, and security best practices.
  • Proven experience in leading security projects from conception to completion.
  • Hands-on experience with security assessment tools, vulnerability management, and incident response.
  • Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills.
  • Ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.
  • Team Management
  • Manage Client escalations, reporting and Vendor Management
